recipesJson.name: Sustard
recipesJson.author: BubbasBrewz
recipesJson.description:
Premium Custard speaks for itself at 3% 

Raspberry Jelly Bean adds a darker note which fits the custard well. Tastes like a raspberry jam

Portuguese egg tart and crumble topping make up the base-mid notes

reviews.text: Are your notes wrong or ingredients? You talk about raspberry jam... but I donâ€™t see that as an ingredient... I am going to mix this anyway...
